content.question:
Define bicameralism. 

Identify one of the six countries covered in the AP Comparative Government and Politics course that has a bicameral national legislature. 

Explain why a federal democracy is likely to have a bicameral national legislature.

Provide one other reason for a bicameral national legislature. 

Describe two implications of federalism for the policy-making process

frqParts.text:
Define bicameralism. 

Identify one of the six countries covered in the AP Comparative Government and Politics course that has a bicameral national legislature.

Provide one other reason for a bicameral national legislature. 

Describe two implications of federalism for the policy-making process

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
